sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Nav, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { listBrands } from '../actions/brandActions' import { listCategories } from '../actions/categoryActions' const Navigation = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const brandList = useSelector(state => state.brandList) const { brands } = brandList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listBrands()) }, [dispatch]) return ( <>
    Home
    {brands && brands.map(brand => ( <> {brand.name}
    ))}
    Mens
    Womens
    Kids
    About
) } export default Navigation
